forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun stretches across Downtown San Francisco, the skies hang clear in a serene embrace, the vibrant blue forming a perfect backdrop to the city’s iconic silhouettes. With a high near fifty-five, the brisk air brings a gentle warmth, creating a landscape both inviting and crisp. The west wind whispers softly, a mere breath at three to seven miles per hour, adding just a hint of movement to the stillness of this late January day. It seems the fog that often graces the hills has chosen to retreat, leaving only memory of its cool touch, perhaps lingering shyly in the recesses of the bay.

As twilight beckons, expect a gradual descent into partly cloudy skies, a soothing transition toward nightfall with temperatures dipping to around forty-five. Even as the sun lowers, dressing in layers remains wise—a comfortable sweater paired with a light jacket will be perfect for a stroll through the neighborhoods or a quiet evening at a local café. For those adventurous souls, the weather invites a leisurely bike ride along the waterfront or a visit to one of the quieter parks, allowing the soft glow of the setting sun to lay its golden hue over the city, casting fleeting shadows that dance across the facades of its storied buildings.
